contentrichtext.text: <!-- Only add acronyms that actually have a wiki article --> In '''sport:''' * [[Deutsche Tourenwagen Masters]], a motor-racing series staged annually in Germany since 2000 * [[Deutsche Tourenwagen Meisterschaft]], a motor-racing championship staged in Germany from 1984 to 1995 In '''computing:''' * Deterministic [[Turing machine]], an abstract symbol-manipulating device that was first described in 1936 by Alan Turing * [[Digital terrain model]], a digital representation of ground-surface topography or terrain * [[Discrete multitone modulation]], an ADSL modulation method * [[Driver Test Manager]], a test-automation framework provided by Microsoft as a part of Windows Driver Kit (WDK) * [[Dual Transfer Mode]], supporting simultaneous voice and packet data in a GSM network * [[Dynamic synchronous Transfer Mode]], a networking technology In '''process control/automation:''' * A [[Device Type Manager]] (DTM) is part of the Field Device Tool (FDT) standard that is a software component for a device that contains the device-specific data, functions and logic elements. DTMs can reach from a simple graphical user interface for setting device parameters up to a highly sophisticated application that, for example, can perform complex calculations for diagnostics and maintenance purposes or can implement arbitrarily complex business logics for device calibration. In '''media:''' * [[Dennis the Menace (disambiguation)]], original comics as well as TV series, films and video games based on them * [[Detroit Techno Militia]], a collective of techno DJs and Musicians in Michigan. * DTM stands for [[:ja:デスクトップミュージック|desktop music]], an [[wasei-eigo|English term originating from Japan]], roughly meaning [[Computer Music]]. In '''demography:''' * [[Demographic transition model]], a model used to represent the changes in birth- and death-rates of a country In '''certification:''' * [[Toastmasters International#Distinguished Toastmaster|Distinguished Toastmaster]], a certification of Toastmasters International In '''transportation:''' * [[Dortmund Airport]], an international airport in Germany {{disambig}}
